thread.title: Carol Burns

author: Carol Burns
title: Carol Burns
text: I had a big problem finding what I was looking for, and then ordering, on your website. This did not happen the first time I ordered from you, but the flags came quickly and look great in our front yard. I wish you had a stronger material in the Marine Corps flag. The wind and sun here in the desert really do a job on the nylon material. I do a lot of mending inbetween flags.
